author: cms-btv-pog
body:
Partial backport of #12863 (updates to the PATJetSlimmer excluded since they would affect the MiniAOD event content by changing the internal content of slimmed jets) + additional fix for the problem with jet correction factors in PATJetUpdater reported in https://hypernews.cern.ch/HyperNews/CMS/get/jes/574.html

**Update (Jan. 14, 2016):** Added backport of #12953

**Update (Jan. 19, 2016):** Added backport of #12988
title: Added updateJetCollection() function to jetTools.py and related changes to the PATJetUpdater and the pat::Jet class (74X)
